title: Onigiri VS Sandwich
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Still, if it’s for a bento it’s got to be onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I think sandwiches are better. You can put all kinds of things to fill a sandwich, so it’s easy to get your proper nutrition<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You can put all kinds of things in onigiri too. Rice is amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Rice is indeed great…. but bread has been a staple food that sustained people since a long time ago. Like, there are even depictions of people harvesting wheat on Egyptian murals<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Egyptian murals…. Wow…. But, but, in Japan, there hasn’t been any major conflict because of wheat, but there have been a few because of rice. Like the Rice Riots!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>W-, when you put it that way…. Maybe rice is really great after all….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>B-, but, you’re right, it’s true that sandwiches are easy to eat….! Bread has been around for a long time too, and it’s a staple food in a lot of countries….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>….Then, I guess let’s call the Onigiri VS Sandwich battle a draw….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, that’s right. Both are great and delicious, so they’re both winners~.... Huh? There’s a message from Ai-san in the group chat<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re right. Umm…. “We’re having a rice sandwich party at Nijigaku! Rice sandwich is the best! It’s got the best of onigiri and sandwiches♪”.... Or so she said<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>….A third challenger….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Even though we just agreed….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
